channel.title: Metawork on Website of Dmitry Kabanov
channel.description: Recent content in Metawork on Website of Dmitry Kabanov

item.title: Books on writing science
item.description: To be successful in academia, it is very important to have a good skill in writing and to write often and productively. Because the good skill in writing is rarely taught, one should learn it from reading books on the topic.
